栴字的基本解释

栴
zhān
〔栴檀〕ａ．檀香，常绿小乔木，如“巾之劫贝布，馔以栴栴饵。”ｂ．山茶科的紫茎属植物。

栴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhān］
［《廣韻》諸延切，平仙，章。］
亦作“1”。
见“栴檀”。

栴字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　栴； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页523第24
【集韻】【類篇】【正韻】?諸延切，音旃。栴檀，香木。或作㮵。【古今註】栴檀木出扶南，色紫，亦謂之紫檀。

栴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
栴字的起名意思

指檀香，常绿小乔木或是山茶科的紫茎属植物。

Zhi
Basic explanation of words
Zhi
zhān
[栴tan] a. Sandalwood, a small evergreen tree, such as "the towel of the robbery shell cloth, and the delicacy is bait." b. Eupatorium of the Camellia family.
Zhi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhān］
["Guangyun" Zhu Yanqie, Pingxian, chapter. ]
Also known as "1".
See "Yintan".
Zhi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　栴; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 523 24
[Ji Yun] [Class Chapter] [Zheng Yun]? Zhu Yanqie, Yin Yang. Sandalwood, fragrant wood. Or make 㮵. [Ancient and Modern Note] The color of sandalwood from Funan is purple, and it is also called red sandalwood.
